author: icematty
content: Interesting analysis. What do you mean by only 1 bundle per block?

author: trent_vanepps
content: the flashbots system sends sets of tx to miners directly, these are called "bundles." until recently, there could only be one per block

author: icematty
content: Very cool! London update changed that to allow more bundles ?

author: ssh4098
content: no, that's purely a flashbots thing
